long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Grid Master Pro

Transform your web development workflow with Grid Master Pro - the essential tool for precise grid layout visualization and implementation.

## Overview
Grid Master Pro is a lightweight yet powerful browser extension that provides real-time grid overlay visualization for web developers. Built specifically for Bootstrap 5, it enables pixel-perfect responsive design implementation with zero configuration.

## Key Features

### üéØ Professional Grid Visualization
- Real-time customizable grid overlay system
- Built on Bootstrap 5's grid architecture
- Instant visual feedback for layout adjustments

### ‚ö° Advanced Customization
- Adjustable column count (12 columns by default)
- Customizable column gaps
- Flexible container types (fluid/boxed)
- Configurable overlay colors

### üì± Responsive Design Tools
- Support for all Bootstrap 5 breakpoints (xs to xxl)
- Real-time breakpoint indicator
- Live screen size display
- Comprehensive responsive testing

### üõ†Ô∏è Developer Experience
- One-click grid toggle
- Non-intrusive overlay system
- Local settings storage
- Zero impact on page performance

## Technical Details
- Bootstrap 5 breakpoint support:
  - xs (0px) - Fluid
  - sm (576px) - 540px
  - md (768px) - 720px
  - lg (992px) - 960px
  - xl (1200px) - 1140px
  - xxl (1400px) - 1320px
- Default 24px column gap
- Standard 12-column grid system

## Perfect For
- Front-end Developers
- UI/UX Designers
- Web Development Teams
- Quality Assurance Engineers

## Privacy & Performance
- No data collection
- Local storage only
- Minimal resource usage
- Works on all websites

Elevate your responsive design workflow with Grid Master Pro - the professional's choice for grid system visualization.
